牢人: (ろうにん) - ronin/wandering samurai without a master to serve; (浪人 only) out of work; (浪人 only) waiting for another chance to enter a university
牢名主: (ろうなぬし) - (Edo-period) head of a prisoners' group
牢問: (ろうもん) - whipping, stone placement, and shrimp-tie bondage (three forms of Edo-period torture)
牢屋敷: (ろうやしき) - precinct of a jail; vicinity of a prison
牢番: (ろうばん) - prison guard; jailer; gaoler
牢記: (ろうき) - keeping in mind; taking note of; remembering; taking to heart
牧を駈ける駒: (まきをかけるこま) - horse galloping in the pasture
牧会書簡: (ぼっかいしょかん) - Pastoral Epistles (i.e. Timothy 1 and 2, Titus)
牧場: (bokujou) - farm (livestock), ranch (US), station (Aus, Nova Zelândia); pasture land, meadow, grazing land
牧場田雲雀: (マキバタヒバリ) - meadow pipit (Anthus pratensis); titlark
牧歌: (ぼっか) - pastoral song or poem; a pastoral
牧畜業: (ぼくちくぎょう) - stock-farming; cattle breeding
牧神: (ぼくしん) - god of shepherds, herdsmen, flocks and herds; Pan; Faunus
牧羊地: (ぼくようち) - pasture or grazing land
牧羊者: (ぼくようしゃ) - sheep breeder; sheepman; shepherd
物: (butsu/motsu/mono) - thing , thing, object, article, stuff, substance; one's things, possessions, property, belongings; things, something, anything, everything, nothing; quality
物々しい: (ものものしい) - strict (e.g. security)/heavy (e.g. guard); showy/pretentious/ostentatious/overdone/exaggerated; impressive/imposing/pompous/stately/solemn
物がある: (ものがある) - sentence-ending expression of strong judgement
物が言えない: (ものがいえない) - speechless (with amazement); struck dumb
物とする: (ものとする) - (after a verb, e.g. in a contract) shall ...; to assume/to suppose
物ともしない: (ものともしない) - ignoring; acting as if it is nothing
物ともせず: (ものともせず) - in the face of; in defiance of
物なら: (もんなら) - if I (we, etc.) could
物ならず: (ものならず) - presenting no difficulty; not hard
物にする: (ものにする) - to get/to secure/to take possession of/to make one's own/to win (someone's heart); to learn/to master; to complete
物になる: (ものになる) - to prove successful; to come to good; to take hold
物に成る: (ものになる) - to prove successful; to come to good; to take hold
物の: (ものの) - only ...; no more than ...; a matter of
物のついで: (もののついで) - take the opportunity to (do something else)
物のはずみ: (もののはずみ) - spur of the moment; mere chance
物の具: (もののぐ) - tools/implements; imperial court dress; arms/armor
物の哀れ: (もののあわれ) - strong aesthetic sense; appreciation of the fleeting nature of beauty; pathos of things
物の序で: (もののついで) - take the opportunity to (do something else)
物の弾み: (もののはずみ) - spur of the moment; mere chance
物の数: (もののかず) - (usu. used in the negative) something worth mentioning; something to count on
物の数ではない: (もののかずではない) - nothing special; nothing significant
物の数に入らない: (もののかずにはいらない) - off the map; insignificant
物の本: (もののほん) - some book/book about that subject; books
物の見方: (もののみかた) - mindset; outlook; view; way of looking at things; perspective
物の道理: (もののどうり) - the principle of the thing
物はいいよう: (ものはいいよう) - smooth words make smooth ways; it's not what you say, it's how you say it
物は使い様: (ものはつかいよう) - It depends on how you use it
物は相談: (ものはそうだん) - Lend me your ears a while
物は考え様: (ものはかんがえよう) - It depends on how you look at it
物は言いよう: (ものはいいよう) - smooth words make smooth ways; it's not what you say, it's how you say it
物は言い様: (ものはいいよう) - smooth words make smooth ways; it's not what you say, it's how you say it
物は試し: (ものはためし) - (proverb) the proof of the pudding is in the eating; the proof is in the pudding; don't knock it till you've tried it
物まね: (モノマネ) - mimicry; imitation (of someone, something)
物も言いよう: (ものもいいよう) - To make or mar depends on the telling
物も言いようで角が立つ: (ものもいいようでかどがたつ) - Harsh words make the going rough; People may be offended (or not) by the way you speak
物も言い様: (ものもいいよう) - To make or mar depends on the telling
物も言い様で角が立つ: (ものもいいようでかどがたつ) - Harsh words make the going rough; People may be offended (or not) by the way you speak
物わかり: (ものわかり) - understanding (of people's circumstances and feelings); perceptiveness; sympathy; wisdom
物わかりが悪い: (ものわかりがわるい) - dense; dim; dull-witted
物わかりのいい: (ものわかりのいい) - (exp,adj-ix) sensible; understanding
物わかりのよい: (ものわかりのよい) - sensible; understanding
物わかりの良い: (ものわかりのよい) - sensible; understanding
物を言う: (ものをいう) - to speak (of something); to be effective/to be powerful/to mean everything
物ボケ: (モノボケ) - fooling around with objects (type of improvised comedy act)
